comments.author: dmullaney
comments.body: Same today at Aldi. Some auld lad parked his Lexus SUV across three spots. I told him he was being selfish, and he just laughed and walked off. ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

comments.author: donall
comments.body: My mother lives in a housing estate near a big shopping centre and I have never seen it so bad as this year, I think it's peaked because amazon is coming soon.

comments.author: sted1983
comments.body: You think people are parking like shitehawks because Amazon are coming? Right.

comments.author: DrWarlock
comments.body: I think he's suggesting there will be less shitehawks after Amazon.ie launches like they will magically disappear

comments.author: sted1983
comments.body: I've no idea what the fuck he's talking about if I'm honest.

comments.author: sted1983
comments.body: Maybe Super Valu in Killester will be down a few morons cos Amazon is open in Ireland? Doubt it. By the way big shout out to the tall lad doing the car park cos he's an animal.

comments.author: DrWarlock
comments.body: The worst offender are parents at schools, dunno how Amazon.ie will change it unless they can somehow prime service will deliver kids home

comments.author: sted1983
comments.body: I'd love to see a huge Amazon van deliver kids home from school. Just lash the cunts out of the van and drive on.

comments.body: But don‚Äôt you know those almost-adult secondary schoolers need to be dropped right at the door
